fullText: What saves 'Wicked' from the dustbin of Broadway also-rans is the ferocious talent of Idina Menzel, who plays Elphaba, the future Wicked Witch of the West.
showScoreExcerpt: "Wicked makes endearingly whimsical noises, the sounds of a bona fide crowd-pleaser. Much of the rest of the time, however, the magic fades as the show pursues its rather charmless agenda as a parable about the roots of political evil."

keyPhrases.quote: endearingly whimsical noises, the sounds of a bona fide crowd-pleaser
the magic fades as the show pursues its rather charmless agenda
Much of the rest of the time, however
